backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing access-controlled user profiles and quiz data with storage mixins and various query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI and behavior requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise summaries of major frontend source files for reference.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment config showing translation API and backend canister ID settings.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/shadcn base styling with OKLCH theme variables and quiz gameplay layout utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML bootstrap page loading runtime env.json before starting the React app.
frontend/public/env.json: Runtime environment file containing an empty backend canister ID placeholder.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication, profile flow, diagnostics, quiz navigation, and header visibility behavior.
frontend/src/components/BuildIdentityFoo: Footer component displaying build version v56 and deployment metadata.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentDiagno: Diagnostics panel component that runs health checks, displays errors, and provides export, share, and publish tooling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button that manages Internet Identity authentication state and triggers auth actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple onboarding form that saves a user’s name and completes profile setup.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Creates configured backend actors, loading IDL dynamically and selecting host based on environment.
frontend/src/config/translation.ts: Translation utility that sends text to a configurable translation API and returns translated output.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRestore.ts: Hook for exporting and restoring full backend state snapshots with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportAllQuestions: Hook that exports all quizzes, questions, and block names, capturing diagnostics on failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider managing auth client creation, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePressHold.ts: React hook tracking press-and-hold state with pointer and keyboard handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor calls for profiles, quizzes, questions, and counts with error reporting.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestionTranslatio: Provides cached async translation for text with status and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuizRecovery.ts: Restores questions from one quiz to another and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/quiz/adaptiveScheduler.ts: Implements an adaptive question scheduler with mastery logic, random first-pass ordering, and spacing rules for repeats.
frontend/src/quiz/BackupRestorePanel.tsx: UI panel for exporting quiz data to JSON and restoring from uploaded backups.
frontend/src/quiz/blockUtils.ts: Provides helpers for splitting questions into 100-question blocks and generating labels and ranges.
frontend/src/quiz/draftStorage.ts: Manages localStorage drafts of quizzes, including saving, loading, clearing, and version validation.
frontend/src/quiz/imageUtils.ts: Utilities for validating JPEGs, converting files to blobs, generating preview URLs, and creating ExternalBlobs.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/PdfImportPre: Empty placeholder file for PDF import preview UI.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfImportTyp: Empty placeholder for PDF import type definitions.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfTextExtra: Empty placeholder for PDF text extraction logic.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/questionExtr: Empty placeholder for parsing extracted PDF text into questions.
frontend/src/quiz/PreGameQuestionCountVi: Selects number of questions before starting a quiz, with loading and validation states.
frontend/src/quiz/PreQuizSummaryView.tsx: Shows summary of selected block and question count before starting a quiz with validation.
frontend/src/quiz/QuestionImagePicker.ts: Image upload component for quiz questions supporting JPEG validation, progress display, and removal.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizEditor.tsx: Main quiz editing interface handling question management, recovery, exporting, and block operations.
frontend/src/quiz/quizFlowDiagnostics.ts: Provides optional console-based diagnostics for quiz flow and actions, enabled via localStorage.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizGameplay.tsx: Runs the quiz flow including block selection, question selection, adaptive scheduling, answering, and translations.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizResults.tsx: Displays final quiz score with options to replay, review wrong answers, or return to editor.
frontend/src/quiz/randomSubset.ts: Creates randomized subsets of question indices using Fisher-Yates shuffle.
frontend/src/quiz/sessionTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript types for question performance metrics and session state.
frontend/src/quiz/TroubleshootingPanel.t: Shows quiz data diagnostics including question counts and warnings about missing or conflicting quiz data.
frontend/src/quiz/types.ts: Re-exports Question and QuizId types from the backend.
frontend/src/quiz/validation.ts: Validates quiz questions for content, answer counts, and correct answer selection, returning structured errors.
frontend/src/quiz/WrongAnswersReview.tsx: Lists incorrectly answered questions with navigation back support and scrollable review UI.
frontend/src/quiz/wrongAnswerTypes.ts: Defines types for tracking wrong-answer review entries.
frontend/src/types/env.d.ts: Declares environment variable typings for Vite build and runtime configuration.
frontend/src/utils/actorConnectionInfo.t: Resolves backend canister connection info, determining host, network, and resolution source.
frontend/src/utils/buildStamp.ts: Generates build metadata including timestamp, version, environment, and a stable deployment ID.
Resolves backend canister ID from multiple sources with detailed source tracking and error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Collects, stores, and formats deployment-related errors, including metadata and reporting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/formatPublishChecklis: Generates a plain‑text checklist for publishing a draft build to a live canister with build and canister details.
frontend/src/utils/liveReadiness.ts: Evaluates whether the app is ready for live use based on canister ID resolution and backend health checks.
frontend/src/utils/quizExport.ts: Provides helpers to export quiz data as JSON, trigger downloads, and generate timestamped filenames.
Performs a hard refresh by clearing storage, unregistering service workers, clearing caches, and reloading with cache‑busting.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeEnvStatus.ts: Inspects runtime env.json configuration and reports whether CANISTER_ID_BACKEND and environment data are correctly loaded.
frontend/src/utils/shareLiveVerification: Formats live verification info including build metadata, canister resolution, and health check results for sharing.
frontend/src/utils/stateSnapshotJson.ts: Serializes and deserializes full state snapshots to JSON, handling ExternalBlob conversion and validating structure.
frontend/src/utils/stoppedCanisterDetect: Provides utilities to detect IC0508 stopped-canister errors, extract canister IDs, format user messages, and offer recovery steps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing, with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, known issues, and feature requests focused on rolling back UI and behavior to Version 56.
